img.span: The Federal Communications Commission (FCC) has requested telecommunications and internet service providers nationwide sign the Keep Americans Connected Pledge.
has information on the companies that responded to the pledge.

img.span: If your family needs additional assistance with internet in preparation for Distance Learning, please review this document.
